com.srch2.android.http.service

Class GetRecordResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.srch2.android.http.service.GetRecordResponse

  • public final class GetRecordResponse
extends Object
    Wraps the RESTful response from the SRCH2 search server upon completion of a record retrieval task.

    When either of the method calls to retrieve a record from an index ( mIndexable.getRecordbyID(...) or SRCH2Engine.getRecordByIdFromIndex(...)) is made, the SRCH2Engine will forward the record retrieval request to the SRCH2 search server; after the SRCH2 search server finishes retrieving the record, it will notify the SRCH2Engine of the status of the completed record retrieval task and pass the retrieved record if found. The SRCH2Engine will pass this information through the StateResponseListener callback method onGetRecordByIDComplete(String indexName, GetRecordResponse response) where the GetRecordResponse response is this object.

    If the primary key submitted matches an existing record, wasRecordRetrieved() will return true and getRetrievedRecord() will return the JSONObject representing the record as it exists in the index; if the primary key did not match any existing records, wasRecordRetrieved() will return false and getRetrievedRecord() will return a non-null JSONObject containing no key-pair values.

      • IRRECOVERABLE_NETWORK_ERROR_MESSAGE

        public static final String IRRECOVERABLE_NETWORK_ERROR_MESSAGE
        Indicates the SRCH2 search server was unavailable to process a request.

        Has the constant value of "Connection failed without known cause".
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • wasRecordRetrieved

        public boolean wasRecordRetrieved()
        Indicates whether the record was able to be retrieved: that is, whether the submitted primary key matched an existing record.
        Returns:
        true if the record was retrieved; false otherwise

      • getRetrievedRecord

        public org.json.JSONObject getRetrievedRecord()
        The record retrieved. If no record was able to be retrieved, this JSONObject will not be null but contain no key-pair values.
        Returns:
        the record retrieved if found

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:

      • toToastString

        public String toToastString()
        Convenience method for outputting to toasts.
        Returns:
        a human readable description of this object that nicely fits into a toast

      • getRESTfulHTTPStatusCode

        public final int getRESTfulHTTPStatusCode()
        For each task executed by the SRCH2 search server, the server will return a HTTP status code of the completed request. Calling this method returns this status code.
        Returns:
        the HTTP status code as returned by the SRCH2 search server

      • getRESTfulResponseLiteral

        public final String getRESTfulResponseLiteral()
        For each task executed by the SRCH2 search server, the server will return a RESTful response in for the form a JSONObject. Calling this method will return the literal of this JSONObject.

        This method may return the value of IRRECOVERABLE_NETWORK_ERROR_MESSAGE if the SRCH2 search server was unavailable.
        Returns:
        the RESTful response literal as returned by the SRCH2 search server
